abstract: NHL Roundup; Detroit Red Wings defeat New York Rangers, 2-1; other hockey results and news noted.
lead_paragraph: Martin was suspended for one game by the N.H.L. for kneeing Dallas Stars defenseman Trevor Daley.

headline.main: Ex-Devil, Making His Red Wings Debut, Sinks the Rangers
headline.print_headline: Ex-Devil, Making His Red Wings Debut, Sinks the Rangers

snippet: Martin was suspended for one game by the N.H.L. for kneeing Dallas Stars defenseman Trevor Daley.
